name: The Geisha's Kimono Handmade Soap
description:
The Geishaâ€™s Kimono- The art and beauty of a Geisha is so inviting and tantalizing. As you sit mesmerized by her calculated moves and delicate motions, you catch a trace of delightful exotic white tea leaves with a sparkling nuance of mulberry, fragrant mimosa, and plum wine. She flips her elegant sleeve and your senses are enlightened with notes of peony and rare white flowers blended to perfection. Whispers of airy petals and soft white musk perfectly envelope this well rounded unisex fragrance.


This bar packs a lot of aroma, and is full is rich ingredients. Made with activated charcoal to cleanse the pores, saponified unrefined shea butter, coconut oil, cocoa butter, mango butter, palm kernel oil, sunflower oil, castor oil, and fragrance. Each bar is approx 5.2 oz. Receive 1 bar with your order.

name: Kyushu Handmade Shea Butter Soap
description:
Named after a river in Japan, Kyushu is a revitalizing medley of sharp citrus notes of orchard limes, grapefruit and tangerines atop of a velvety green heart of thyme with a smooth woody base.

Made with our fine blend of saponified oils including Palm Kernel, Unrefined Shea Butter, Castor Oil, Mango Butter, Sunflower Oil, and the best fragrance oil on the market. Each bar weighs approx 4.2 oz.

name: Blackberry Amber Handmade Soap
description:
Blackberry Amber is sweetness and seduction wrapped into one. Features notes of Blackberries, Red Raspberries, Jasmine, Dew Berries, Caramel, Heliotrope, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Amber, Patchouli and Musk.

Made with palm kernel oil, sunflower oil, castor oil, saponified unrefined shea butter, and fragrance.

Receive one 4.5 oz bar with your order.

name: Maharani Handmade Shea Butter Soap
description:
Maharani is a blend of heavy florals, oriental rose and night blooming jasmine led by silky sandalwood with strong incense undertones. Sweet vanilla and earthly patchouli emerge with whispers of a powdery musk, amber, and frankincense. This fragrance draws you in an envelopes you with its intoxicating allure.

Made with Unrefined Shea Butter, Palm Kernel Oil, Sunflower Oil, Castor Oil, Vegetable Shortening, and Fragrance. Receive a 4 oz bar with your order.

name: Badedas Handmade Soap- So fresh and invigorating
description:
Badedas- A fresh invigorating blend of lavender, fir, lemon and eucalyptus enhanced with orange zests and "cut grass" on a dry down of cedar wood and Tonya beans.

This soap's recipe includes Saponified Castor Oil, Soybean Shortening, Canola Oil, Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Palm Kernel Oil and fragrance. Each bar weighs between5.0 - 5.5 oz.

I make cold processed soap in carefully monitored small batches using precise weight and calculations. My soaps are allowed to cure for 4-5 weeks and the batch is pH tested for mildness before shipping to ensure that it has completely cured before packaging. Each bar retains the natural glycerin produced (unlike commercial bars where the company removes the glycerin and sells it) and each bar is different. Each bar has unique characteristics expected to occur in common to the handmade soaping process.
